commitResults.messageBody:
Moved main function into Main.java class
Changed the welcome logo and texts

added addTask and listTasks for Duke class to send TaskManager requests
added switch-case statement in main function to filter commands

Added ability to set tasks as done in the chatbot
Changed the switch-case in main to if-else statements

commitResults.messageTitle: Minor rearrangement of code in Main

commitResults.messageBody:
Removed final for some variables
Duke LOGO is now final

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for tracking three types of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
- ToDo, Deadline, Event are added as children of Task class
- Add InputFilter class to separate command and date details from input
- Changed greet and exit messages as a constant for better encapsulation
- Removed error handling from Task Manager (Exceptions to be implemented in future versions)
- Changed to switch-case statement in Main

- Introduced InputParser to parse inputs into command and parameters
- Improved the OO model of the program
- Renamed constants to follow guidelines
- Added help and echo commands for Duke

- input.txt contains inputs for testing
- populated EXPECTED.txt for testing
- Add trimInput method to trim all elements in a given String array. This method is used in all three separate methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more test cases for input.txt
Add Clear function to clear all tasks
commitResults.messageBody: - Modified input.txt and EXPECTED.txt for testing of clear as well
- executing Duke calls handleUserInput which checks for any inputs that are of length 1, if no match, it will call parseUserInputString.

userInputString will be trimmed after being taken as input.
This is different from the trimInput() function in InputParser, as it trims the individual array elements after being separated.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactored trimInput() for better clarity of the purpose of the method
Add DukeException to handle most exceptions
commitResults.messageBody:
1. echo input is null
2. todo input is null
3. deadline description is null
4. deadline date is null
5. event description is null
6. event date is null
7. done missing number
8. done wrong number format
9. done number is out of scope of task manager
10. invalid command
Repackaged and declared Task as abstract class
